about_the_game: The trial version of Noise Box, onlykeeps the same functions as the full version, and the necessary basic resources. It won't iterate with version resource updates, but features will stay in sync.
detailed_description: The trial version of Noise Box, onlykeeps the same functions as the full version, and the necessary basic resources. It won't iterate with version resource updates, but features will stay in sync.
name: NoiseBox.噪音盒子 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-7200U @2.50GHz 3.1GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10(64bit)
  • Processor: 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-11800H @2.30GHz 2.30 GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The trial version of Noise Box, onlykeeps the same functions as the full version, and the necessary basic resources. It won't iterate with version resource updates, but features will stay in sync.
